data.title: Oracle Demantra Demand Management
data.meta_description: Oracle Demantra Demand Management - Free download as Word Doc (.doc / .docx), PDF File (.pdf), Text File (.txt) or read online for free. This document provides an overview of Oracle's Demand Management software. It discusses how the software helps with demand planning and forecasting through a collaborative process. Key aspects covered include: the demand planning process of analyzing historical sales and predicting future demand; how forecasts are used downstream in production planning; the iterative demand management process; collecting and loading data; generating and approving forecasts; and uploading the approved forecast. It also discusses features like demand planning for multiple lines of business and product families.
